languages.text: {n}Вы с трудом узнаете преподобного Иеронимуса. Его тело покрыто взбухшими язвами и нарывами, один глаз почти вылез из орбиты и сочится тошнотворно-зеленоватым гноем, а другой покрывает бельмо. Размыкая изуродованные химическими ожогами губы, он произносит:{/n} "Император защищает, {mf|сыне|дщерь}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы с трудом узнаете преподобного Иеронимуса. Его тело покрыто взбухшими язвами и нарывами, один глаз почти вылез из орбиты и сочится тошнотворно-зеленоватым гноем, а другой покрывает бельмо. Размыкая изуродованные химическими ожогами губы, он произносит:{/n} "Император защищает, {mf|сыне|дщерь}".

languages.text: {n}You barely recognise Reverend Hieronymus. His body is covered in swollen ulcers and abscesses, one eye has almost popped out of its socket, oozing with revolting greenish pus, and the other eye is clouded with cataracts. He parts his lips deformed by chemical burns and says,{/n} "The Emperor protects."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы с трудом узнаете преподобного Иеронимуса. Его тело покрыто взбухшими язвами и нарывами, один глаз почти вылез из орбиты и сочится тошнотворно-зеленоватым гноем, а другой покрывает бельмо. Размыкая изуродованные химическими ожогами губы, он произносит:{/n} "Император защищает, {mf|сыне|дщерь}".

traits.locale_text: {n}You can barely recognise Reverend Hieronymus. His body is covered in swollen ulcers and abscesses, one eye has almost popped out of its socket, oozing with revolting greenish pus, and the other eye is a cataract. He parts his lips deformed by chemical burns and says,{/n} "The Emperor protects, my {mf|son|daughter}."

He parts his lips deformed by chemical burns and says,{/n} "The Emperor protects."

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムス司祭は変わり果てていた。その肉体は膨れた潰瘍と膿瘍に覆われ、不快な緑色の膿がにじんだ片目はほぼ飛び出し、もう片方の目は白内障で濁っている。薬品で爛れた唇を開き、語りかける。{/n}「皇帝の加護のあらんことを」
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise Reverend Hieronymus. His body is covered in swollen ulcers and abscesses, one eye has almost popped out of its socket, oozing with revolting greenish pus, and the other eye is clouded with cataracts. He parts his lips deformed by chemical burns and says,{/n} "The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムス司祭は変わり果てていた。その肉体は膨れた潰瘍と膿瘍に覆われ、不快な緑色の膿がにじんだ片目はほぼ飛び出し、もう片方の目は白内障で濁っている。薬品で爛れた唇を開き、語りかける。{/n}「皇帝の加護のあらんことを」

languages.text: {n}C'est à peine si vous reconnaissez le révérend Hiéronymus. Son corps est couvert d'ulcères et d'abcès gonflés, l'un de ses yeux est presque délogé de son orbite et suinte un pus vert ignoble, tandis que l'autre est aveuglé par la cataracte. Il entrouvre ses lèvres déformées par des brûlures chimiques et annonce :{/n} « Que l'Empereur vous protège. »
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise Reverend Hieronymus. His body is covered in swollen ulcers and abscesses, one eye has almost popped out of its socket, oozing with revolting greenish pus, and the other eye is clouded with cataracts. He parts his lips deformed by chemical burns and says,{/n} "The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}C'est à peine si vous reconnaissez le révérend Hiéronymus. Son corps est couvert d'ulcères et d'abcès gonflés, l'un de ses yeux est presque délogé de son orbite et suinte un pus vert ignoble, tandis que l'autre souffre d'une grave cataracte. Il entrouvre ses lèvres déformées par des brûlures chimiques et annonce :{/n} « Que l'Empereur vous protège, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. »

languages.text: {n}你几乎都快要认不出希罗尼穆斯牧师了。他身上布满了肿胀的溃疡与脓肿，一只眼睛渗着令人作呕的绿色脓液，几乎要从眼窝里蹦出来，而另一只眼睛蒙上了一层白障。他的嘴唇由于化学灼烧而变了形，他翕动着嘴唇，开了口。{/n}“帝皇保佑众生。”
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise Reverend Hieronymus. His body is covered in swollen ulcers and abscesses, one eye has almost popped out of its socket, oozing with revolting greenish pus, and the other eye is clouded with cataracts. He parts his lips deformed by chemical burns and says,{/n} "The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}你几乎都快要认不出希罗尼穆斯牧师了。他身上布满了肿胀的溃疡与脓肿，一只眼睛渗着令人作呕的绿色脓液，几乎要从眼窝里蹦出来，而另一只眼睛已经患上了白内障。他的嘴唇由于化学灼烧而变了形，他翕动着嘴唇，开了口。{/n}“帝皇保佑众生，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。”

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst Reverend Hieronymus kaum wieder. Sein Körper ist bedeckt mit Geschwülsten und Abszessen, ein Auge ist weit aus seiner Höhle getreten, aus der grüner Eiter sickert. Das andere Auge ist durch Katarakte getrübt. Er öffnet seine von chemischen Verbrennungen deformierten Lippen und sagt:{/n} "Der Imperator schützt."
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise Reverend Hieronymus. His body is covered in swollen ulcers and abscesses, one eye has almost popped out of its socket, oozing with revolting greenish pus, and the other eye is clouded with cataracts. He parts his lips deformed by chemical burns and says,{/n} "The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst Reverend Hieronymus kaum wieder. Sein Körper ist bedeckt mit Geschwülsten und Abszessen, ein Auge hat seine Höhle fast vollständig verlassen, aus der ekelhafter grüner Eiter trieft, und das andere Auge ist vollständig getrübt. Er öffnet seine von chemischen Verbrennungen deformierten Lippen und sagt:{/n} "Der Imperator schützt Euch, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}."

languages.text: {n}Casi no reconoces a Hieronymus al verlo. Tiene grandes úlceras y abscesos por todo el cuerpo y uno de sus ojos, que rezuma un repulsivo pus verdoso, prácticamente se le sale de la cuenca, mientras que en el otro está nublado por cataratas. Separa los labios y dice:{/n} «El Emperador protege».
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise Reverend Hieronymus. His body is covered in swollen ulcers and abscesses, one eye has almost popped out of its socket, oozing with revolting greenish pus, and the other eye is clouded with cataracts. He parts his lips deformed by chemical burns and says,{/n} "The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}Casi no reconoces a Hieronymus al verlo. Tiene grandes úlceras y abscesos por todo el cuerpo y uno de sus ojos, que rezuma un repulsivo pus verdoso, prácticamente se le sale de la cuenca, mientras que en el otro sufre de cataratas. Separa los labios y dice:{/n} «El Emperador protege, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: {n}Muhterem Hieronymus'u zar zor tanıyabiliyorsun. Bedeni şişmiş çıbanlarla ve apselerle kaplı. Gözünün biri yuvasından fırlamak üzere gibi, üstelik yeşilimsi bir iltihap akıtıyor. Diğer gözüne ise perde inmiş. Kimyasal yanıklarla deforme olmuş dudaklarını aralayıp konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İmparator korur."
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise Reverend Hieronymus. His body is covered in swollen ulcers and abscesses, one eye has almost popped out of its socket, oozing with revolting greenish pus, and the other eye is clouded with cataracts. He parts his lips deformed by chemical burns and says,{/n} "The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muhterem Hieronymus'u zar zor tanıyabiliyorsun. Bedeni şişmiş çıbanlarla ve apselerle kaplanmış. Gözünün biri yuvasından fırlamak üzere gibi ve yeşilimsi bir iltihap akıtıyor. Diğer gözü ise kataraklarla kaplanmış. Kimyasal yanıklarla deforme olmuş dudaklarını aralıyor ve konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "İmparator korur."
